**Government Tender Announcement: Request for Information**

** Opportunity Title**

Senior IT Accessibility Specialists

**Reference Number**

cb-4407-51188664

**Publication Date**

2023-04-03

**Tender Closing Date and Time**

2023-04-14T14:00:00

**Request for Information Background**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking information from vendors through a Request for Information (RFI) for senior IT accessibility specialists. The goal of this RFI is to gather detailed information from vendors to assist the CBSA in planning and acquiring professional services to support accessibility testing, build accessibility best practices, mentor and educate employees on accessibility processes, and identify, evaluate, and test the accessibility of existing and in-flight CBSA IT applications and tools.

**Background on Accessibility Legislation**

In July 2019, the Government of Canada enacted the Accessible Canada Act, which aims to promote the inclusion and participation of Canadians with disabilities by removing barriers in information and communication technologies. The Accessibility and Technology Adaptation Program (AATP) was formed in January 2022 to implement this law and ensure all existing CBSA IT applications and tools are accessibility compliant by January 1, 2040.

**Requirements and Objectives**

The CBSA invites vendors to respond to the following questions and provide detailed information about their services:

* Conduct accessibility testing against current standards
* Build accessibility best practices into development standards
* Mentor and educate AATP employees on accessibility processes
* Identify, evaluate, and test the accessibility of existing and in-flight CBSA IT applications and tools

**Tender Details**

* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: None

**Contact Information**

Nataliya Sekret
CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca

**Attachments**

The tender notice and detailed information on the RFI can be found at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4407/1000439633---letter-of-interest---senior-it-accessibility-specialists.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4407/1000439633---loi---specialistes-principaux-en-accessibilite-des-ti_fr.pdf (French)
